content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Baihu Li. As the landlord, I would like to offer you the best possible rental price for the apartment. May I know what your budget is for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate the rental price. I am a student and I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. I hope we can come to an agreement.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Understood, Baihu Li. As a landlord, I want to maximize my gains from the apartment, but I am also willing to be reasonable and negotiate with you. May I know how much you are willing to pay for the apartment each month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month for the apartment. Is that acceptable to you?

If not, please let me know what price you are looking for.

Thank you.

I am willing to negotiate the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Baihu Li. I am sorry to say that I cannot accept your offer of 500 Euros per month for the apartment. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for the apartment. May I know how much higher you are willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine
